title: The Way of a river
brief_description: This film follows the River Test, Hampshire, from its source to its mouth in Southampton Water. It is a clear, swift-flowing trout stream, completely unmpolluted, despite factories on its lower reaches. Underwater sequences of trout spawning and a fish’s eyeview of the angler are shown.
